name: Platform Master (aeterponis)
description:
Platform Master

It is a game that aims to complete the levels quickly and without any mistakes.

Spider asset is belong to the Elthen's Pixel Art Shop - itch.io

NOTE:

This game is one of the first games i made.

I found the files recently and I thought I'd post it no matter how bad it was.

hope y'all don't have a nervous breakdown :)

(small note: use any bugs you find to pass levels)

HOW TO PLAY

Left/Right Arrows for horizontal movement

Space for Jump

Left Control For Wall grabbing

Left Shift For Dash
